name: The Quarter Silom by UHG
detail: Me and my GF decided to change the hotels everyday while we were visiting Bangkok. After we came to the Quater Silom we stopped moving to the other places. Really great place with a perfect location and kind staff. Would come and stay here again! Thanks to the management and to everyone who make this place to be as it is! üôè

name: Sunday Platinum Suites
detail: The staff are very friendly and helpful.

name: Townhouse Siam Privi Hotel
detail: My girlfriend and I stayed for more than 4 week, because the price and value was the best on Agoda. + best price (450 THB) + big (35 sm) bright rooms + led TV + new comfortable mattresses + very friendly stuff + 15 minutes walk to MRT Hui Kwang + lots of cheep massage, services and food around + night market Hui Kwang has a lot of good fruits and vegetables for best price + no smoking rooms + quite place =============================== - no sightseeing - if you don't like to walk, you should take a taxi or bike everytime you go somewhere =============================== After all, one of the best hotels for such price, no doubt we will recommend it, and enjoy it on our next visit to Bangkok

name: Evergreen Place Siam by UHG
detail: i think this is one of the best hotels in bangkok in the very affordable range. the rooms are very spacious, even with kitchennette facilities. sauna, steamer and pool are simply great. massage facilities have very professional people working there (probably the best massage we had in thailand). and, most importantly, there buffet breakfast is absolutely delicious and we really liked there attention to detail. the staff speaks english and is very professional. the hotel located 50 m from ratchasima train station and 10 min walk from siam square and siam paragon shopping centre.

name: Grande Centre Point Hotel Ratchadamri
detail: One of my favorite hotels in Bangkok, if not, in all of Thailand. Let's consider the price first. Chances are, on most nights, you can get a high floor room here. Considering the location (Siam shopping/nightlife), and... that this is an authentic 5 star, you just won't go wrong. The only minor setback: just one restaurant in this entire (massive) hotel. But the fact the restaurant has amazing staff (I've stayed here many times- they always remember me, even by my nickname)... and the food is truly classy, I'm ok with it. The hotel itself, is elegant, classy... room decor is a perfect mix of modern/chic style, with a hint of bohemian/classic. Very nicely designed rooms, that make it a true 5 star. I'm a fitness buff... so I can't stand hotels that delegate a small room in a basement somewhere, put two treadmills, and a workout ball in the middle, and then say fitness center included... this hotel, has a real gym- with real machines- even a smith machine (bench press, shoulder press, etc) with sufficient 20 kg plates around for a serious workout. Full credits to the hotel for this point. It's a big enough gym and very modern too, to feel like you're in a real gym and be motivated. The spa (included, in the rooms) is nice too- with a great steam room, hot tub, and, sauna. Love staying here... a great workout... then relax in the steam room, and then get some amazing food at their restauarant. Seriously, for this price- you'll have a hard time finding better in this area. I know, for I've tried many others in the area, and always end up coming back here.

name: The Landmark Bangkok
detail: Exceptional hotel at one of the best locations that can be.

name: Grande Centre Point Sukhumvit 55 Thong Lo
detail: This hotel is a 'real' 5 star hotel. I've stayed in three 5 star hotels in Bangkok prior to Grand Centre Point. This beats them all. The staff are fun and consistently polite to guests. They play with the children interact with the guests and add a nice feel to the hotel. Breakfast had flavourful, good quality produce which was great for 320baht if you don't include breakfast in your booking. The design of the hotel is stylish and modern plus the view from our 26th floor room was amazing. You could see Bangkok for miles. head to the pool with a glass barrier around the outside where Bangkok can be seen... as well as heard quite well! One problem with it was the gym it was a little empty however you don't really spend your time in a gym! One last problem was the Spa area. I really wanted to just go inside and see it before I booked anything however this was prohibited. Even when no one is using it you still can't have a look with a member of staff.

name: Rembrandt Hotel Bangkok
detail: this is by far one of the best hotels in bangkok when you look at it overall. it has a friendly staff, with excellent restaurants and dining options such as mexican, italian, indian, thai, etc. each of the restaurants are one of the best in thailand in their respective cuisine. rooms are a little old and bath-tub shower is a little put-off. but overall its excellent!

name: Suvarnabhumi Ville Airport Hotel
detail: We booked this hotel as our last night in Thailand and as it was near to the airport. Great place and still close enough to jump in a taxi to visit more central locations in Bangkok. Great staff, friendly, kind and helpful. Beautiful restaurant on the roof top, we only had drinks but the food looked amazing.

name: Ruamchitt Plaza Hotel
detail: OK, it is rare to have a hotel in bangkok where smoking is allowed and it was quite a stay for us. It was very quiet hotel too so you can sleep well at night. It was not a bad hotel at all. For that price, I think it is all worthwhile. I would give five stars if they gave me bottle water the first day when I checked in, so next time, give me water! LOL... Roberson is nearby and so as all transportation. If you are looking to snack shopping, Roberson can fulfill all your snack needs. There were quite a lot of nice restaurants nearby and across the road as well. And there is an old book store nearby and it was a germ! I would definitely stay in this hotel next time. My suggestion, probably better ventilation before check in, it was quite hot in bangkok with the sun shine directly, no amount of air condition can cool the room down in an instant. Also, better television, it was almost impossible to watch anything, the reception was very bad.
